name: Painter Flowmap Library
summary: A FLOWMAPLIBRARY file contains a collection of flow maps used by Corel Painter, an application for creating digital artwork. It stores various flow maps, which add a textured surface to particle brushes that direct the flow of the paint. Examples of flow map textures in a FLOWMAPLIBRARY file include gravel, window frost, windblown, and furrowed.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
